title: Prehandover Proof
description: Structured prehandover proof for governed PRs with mandatory static analysis gates.

schema_version.description: Schema version 2.0.0 adds mandatory static analysis gates (lint, type-check, build) per Wave 5.6 post-mortem

test_status.description: Overall test execution status (PASS = 100% GREEN, 0 failures)

lint_status.description: Lint validation status (PASS = 0 errors, 0 warnings; MANDATORY for application code PRs)

type_check_status.description: Type-check validation status (PASS = 0 type errors; MANDATORY for TypeScript/typed languages)

build_status.description: Build validation status (PASS = successful build, exit code 0; MANDATORY for application code PRs)

static_analysis_summary.description: Summary of all static analysis gate results

all_gates_pass.description: True if ALL applicable static gates (lint, type-check, build, tests) pass

blocking_failures.description: List of gates that failed and block handover

handover_permitted.description: False if ANY static gate fails; handover strictly prohibited per Wave 5.6 learning
